text: Katy Jane Carmichael (born 5 March 1970) is an English actress, director, and producer. She is known for her roles as DC Jo McMullen in the ITV crime drama series Liverpool 1 (1998–1999), Twist Morgan in the Channel 4 sitcom Spaced (1999–2001), Lucy Barlow in the ITV soap opera Coronation Street (2002–2003), and Melissa Ryan in the BBC One school-based drama series Waterloo Road (2009). == Personal life == Carmichael was born and brought up in Liverpool. She has been married to actor Tristan Sturrock since 2005. They have three children together. == Other websites == * Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:English comedians Category:Actors from Liverpool
title: Katy Carmichael
